title: Record movie attendance increases P, Q of popcorn

content.prompt: Assume that popcorn and movie attendance are complements and that Salty Concession grows corn suitable for popping. Mr Concession will most likely sell a greater quantity of popping corn at a higher price if which of the following occurs?

choices.label: The wages of farm workers and movie theater employees increase.
A technological improvement results in less expensive and more efficient harvesting of corn.
The introduction of new fat-free potato chips provides new competition in the snack-food market.
The release of three summer movies sets records for movie attendance
New government regulations force movie theaters to hire more security guards at each theater.

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
